title: How do I setup a DNS name in my VM?
description: The DNS name provides a friendly name for your virtual machine. The DNS name label is a property of the Public IP associated with your VM. You can configure it using the Essentials panel in the VM or the Networking section

uiSteps.text: Click on DNS name in Essentials to configure the DNS name
Edit the DNS name label field and click save

title: How do I open RDP or SSH port?
description: If you want to connect to your Virtual Machine via RDP or SSH, one way to do it is opening the respective ports in the Network Security Group

uiSteps.text: If you want to connect to your Virtual Machine via RDP or SSH, one way to do it is opening the respective ports in the Network Security Group
Click on 'Add inbound port rule' button
Add the rule to the NSG. Ensure that the priority of the rule is high enough so it is not overruled by other existing rules

substeps.text: Select RDP or SSH in the service drop down
